-- (1) Карточки поступившие министру на подпись -- SELECT cardID FROM ( SELECT c.card_id as cardID, coalesce(av_u.value_id, 2000000000) as avuValId FROM Card c LEFT OUTER JOIN attribute_value av ON av.card_id = c.card_id and (av.attribute_code in ('JBR_SIGN_TODATE'))
-- "срочность" LEFT JOIN attribute_value av_u on (av_u.card_id = c.card_id) and (av_u.attribute_code = 'JBR_HOWFAST')
-- помошники подписанта... INNER JOIN attribute_value avUser ON ( avUser.card_id = c.card_id and ( ( avUser.attribute_code in ('JBR_SIGN_RESPONSIBLE') and exists ( -- помошники для персоны из avUser.number_value select 1 from attribute_value av_m join attribute_value av_a JOIN card arm_c ON arm_c.card_id = av_a.card_id on av_a.card_id = av_m.card_id where av_m.attribute_code = 'JBR_ARM_MANAGER' and av_m.number_value = avUser.number_value and av_a.attribute_code = 'JBR_ARM_ASSISTANT' and av_a.number_value in (%CURRENTUSERS%) and arm_c.status_id not in (34145, 6) ) -- exists )
-- (348) "Визирование": 'ADMIN_833056'="Помощник согласующего - скрытый"/U or ( -- Пользователь - "Помощник" для "подписант" (JBR_SIGN_RESPONSIBLE) ... (avUser.attribute_code ='JBR_SIGN_RESPONSIBLE') and avUser.number_value in ( SELECT p_av.number_value FROM person p_p JOIN attribute_value p_av ON (p_av.attribute_code = 'JBR_ASSISTANT_FOR' AND p_av.card_id = p_p.card_id) WHERE p_p.person_id IN (%CURRENTUSERS%) ) ) -- or ) -- and ) WHERE ( ( -- Шаблон=Подпись (365) -- статус="Обработка помощником"(73992) (c.template_id = 365) and (c.status_id = 73992)
-- "Подпись"(365): "Подписант"/U('JBR_SIGN_RESPONSIBLE') -- and (avUser.attribute_code ='JBR_SIGN_RESPONSIBLE') ) ) GROUP BY cardID, avuValId ORDER by 2 ASC, min(av.date_value) DESC ) AS a -- ORDER by 1 DESC
